titles.title: SAFE TO WORK Act
SAFE TO WORK Act
Safeguarding America’s Frontline Employees To Offer Work Opportunities Required to Kickstart the Economy Act

To lessen the burdens on interstate commerce by discouraging insubstantial lawsuits relating to COVID-19 while preserving the ability of individuals and businesses that have suffered real injury to obtain complete relief.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
